function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Survey conducted in non-gated communities to compare housing experiences during the pandemic.","Impact":"Lack of understanding of how urban and architectural design affect disease propagation in non-gated communities.","Mitigation":"Educate residents about the impact of urban and architectural design on disease propagation, and promote awareness of preventive measures.","Technologies":"Public health education campaigns, informational materials, and community workshops.","People":"Residents of non-gated communities in the Eastern Province of Saudi Arabia.","Owner":"Local health authorities, community leaders, and urban planners."}]}
